Summary: Brighter than lightning moved faster than a shooting star.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Roseburg
There were no other sightings in Roseburg on or around August 13th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving on my way home and looked up at the night sky. Saw a shooting star type of visual. But it was a bluish white light. It was brighter than lightning and move like a shooting star. But one with a short path.It moved was faster than a shooting star too. Perfect square trail.
